presentationTable.name: Facts - Post Active Enrollments
presentationTable.description: This folder provides metrics related to learner's Enrollment to various learning items that have reached the terminal status and also the currently active ones

presentationColumns.name: Number of Learners - Post Active
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of all learners
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Enrollments.Number of Learners - Post Active

presentationColumns.name: Number of Enrollments - Post Active
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of Enrollments across all learning items by workers
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Enrollments.Number of Enrollments - Post Active

presentationColumns.name: Number of Courses Enrollment - Post Active
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of courses enrolled by the learner

localization.localizationKey: Number of Courses Enrollment - Post Active

localization.localizationKey: Number of Specializations Enrollment - Post Active
